attributes.action: ask the police to investigate all MP's expense claims which appear to be fraudulent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs' claims must be for a genuine expense related to their work as a member of parliament or fraud has to be suspected. It is a matter of public interest that these are investigated.

rejection.details: The PM cannot instruct the police and CPS in this way.  Anyone can refer a matter to the police for investigation and they have the discretion whether to investigate the matter or not.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
